name: Hexagon (Megabyte Media)
description:
A simple minimalistic 2D Platformer.
Hey, this is my first ever playable Game. It was made in 3 Days with Unity and i hope you like it. If you have constructive criticism, tips and other stuff i would appreciate if you leave a comment here. I'm not entirely sure if i will continue the developement, but if you know any nice features i could add, please let me know.
NOTE : Currently it's only available for Linux as the Windows Port contains several bugs i still need to fix.
